entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
